about.title: CSRFShark - a utility for manipulating cross-site request forgery attacks
about.description: Generate Proof-of-Concept for Cross-Site Request Forgery attacks with the ability to share the result

client-side-rendering.description: All data is generated on the client side using JavaScript, so the service works even without the internet connection

privacy.description: Through the use of URL Hash technology, the server has no information about the client request and the created PoC

share.description: Obtain a link to the generated PoC with just a few clicks

open-source.description: The full code of the service is published on GitHub

real-time.description: Check that the attack works in real-time without leaving the service
